      Cluster ClusterObject.getCurrentCluster()
      Gets a reference to the Cluster in which the ClusterObject is currently contained.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ClusterObject.setCurrentCluster(Cluster currentCluster)
      Sets the Cluster to which the ClusterObject is currently assigned.
      Method parameters in edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.clustering with type arguments of type Cluster 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void ObjectClustering.clustersToMask(WritableImage output, Vector<ClusterObject> clusterObjects, Vector<Cluster> clusters, int k)
      Relabels an Image mask that is labeled with an individual greylevel for each cluster object to have all objects in a single cluster labeled with the same value.
      static double ObjectClustering.getInterClusterDistances(Vector<ClusterObject> clusterObjects, Vector<Cluster> clusters, int k, int n)
      Calculates a metric of clustering goodness, which is based upon the ratio of the average distance between objects withing a cluster to the maximal distance between objects in two different clusters.
      static double DEGaussianMixtureModelClustering.go(Image singleCluster, Vector<ClusterObject> clusterObjects, Vector<Cluster> clusters, int k, int n)
      Performs Gaussian mixture model clustering on the given inputs using a differential evolution algorithm for maximization of the likelihood of having observed the data.
      static int ObjectClustering.initializeObjectsAndClustersFromClusterImage(Image labeledByObject, Image labeledByCluster, Vector<ClusterObject> clusterObjects, Vector<Cluster> clusters, int k)
      Sets up a set of ClusterObjects and a set of Clusters from two Image masks, one labeled with individual objects, and one labeled with all objects in a single cluster grouped with a single label.
      static int ObjectClustering.initializeObjectsAndClustersFromImage(Image im, Vector<ClusterObject> clusterObjects, Vector<Cluster> clusters, int k)
      Sets up a set of ClusterObjects and a set of Clusters from an Image mask with each object labeled with a unique greylevel.
